comments.body: I don't think we need to update this interface. It is unnecessary.

findOldReplicaSets is an un-exported func.
newRS is needed by this func.

Can you clarify how newRS is passed to this func without changing the func ?

I mean just keeping current two methods as they are. They are both local methods. I think it's okay to keep them unchanged.

I am open for the changes if you prefer the newer interface.

The newer interface calculates newRS once.
I prefer the newer interface.
